vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
DrainMe.unlockSecret (patch_6.sol#65-74) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- secret % 5 == 0

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: uint256 secret = uint256(hash);
vulnerability_findings.message:
DrainMe.unlockSecret.secret (local variable @ patch_6.sol#67) shadows:
	- DrainMe.secret (state variable @ patch_6.sol#12)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: address public firstTarget = 0x461ec7309F187dd4650EE6b4D25D93c922d7D56b;
vulnerability_findings.message:
DrainMe.firstTarget should be constant (patch_6.sol#6)
DrainMe.secondTarget should be constant (patch_6.sol#7)

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: pragma solidity ^0.4.23;

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_6.sol:

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in DrainMe.callFirstTarget (patch_6.sol#76-80):
	-require(bool)(firstTarget.call.value(msg.value)()) patch_6.sol#79

	-require(bool)(secondTarget.call.value(msg.value)()) patch_6.sol#85
